name: Bird Chat
description:
Hang out with birds in 3 locales! Tweet at your buddies! Wear cool sunglasses!

Just a simple online multiplayer playground.

note: sometimes it takes a little time to connect to someone's server. If you host a server, make sure that your router is configured correctly to host games! (Uses port 25000)

forest audio track by unfa on freesound.org; harp sounds by Fantom57 on freesound (CC Attribution License)
